subject: Greetings to you from BANK OF
body:
Greetings to you from BANK OF AMERICA .we received a total fund($10.5
million )from office of the Bank America to be credited to you via
online banking service. 
You are advice to provide us with your details
such as below to enable us create your online banking account and
provide you with the username and login, which you can use to login
into your online bank account through our bank website and make your
fund transfer into your personal bank account of your choice.
Full Name:
Your Bank/ details:
Your Swift code:
Your account number:
Age/Gender:
Occupation:
Cell Mobile Number:
Email address:
City:
Scan copy of your Id is very important
 Regard

subject: Re: Greetings to you from BANK OF
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me from the Bank of Erica. I appreciate your assistance in helping me with my funds. Before I provide you with my details, could you please clarify a few things for me? 

1. Could you explain how the online banking service works? 
2. What are the benefits of having an online bank account with the Bank of Erica? 
3. Is there any fee or cost associated with creating and using this online banking account? 
4. How secure is the online banking system at the Bank of Erica? 

Once I have a better understanding of these details, I will be happy to proceed and provide you with the necessary information. Thank you!

Best wishes,
Jack
